author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HEAVY RAINS FROM PILAR AFFECTING PORTIONS OF CENTRAL AMERICA...
summary:
...HEAVY RAINS FROM PILAR AFFECTING PORTIONS OF CENTRAL AMERICA...
 As of 7:00 AM CDT Tue Oct 31
 the center of Pilar was located near 11.4, -90.2
 with movement ENE at 3 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.
